snippet: Lillias White is offering blues standards and Broadway tunes in her cabaret show at 54 Below.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by soul singer Lillias White at 54 Below.
lead_paragraph: Lillias White is offering blues standards and Broadway tunes in her cabaret show at 54 Below.

headline.seo: Lillias White Is Performing at 54 Below
headline.main: Sass of a Blues Mama, the Skill of a Stage Star
